text.title: Use New and Traditional Media to Market Your Business

head.s: Use New and Traditional Media to Market Your Business

p.s: Right now in 2010 , there is no such thing as " the right way to advertise .
" As technology magnifies the infinite number of possibilities to brand an idea , many businesses are confused when it comes to social media platforms .
Likewise , many companies are making use of online tactics but failing to realize their significance and how to best use them .
Many are also forgetting about traditional media , and this is a problem .
So what 's the best way to stay competitive in an ocean full of emerging media ?
Every business should maintain a healthy balance of both new , online tactics as well as traditional media platforms .
Contrary to popular belief , print is not dead .
If you are a business owner , it 's time to cross over to hybrid marketing .
This is how you can use new media and traditional media to market your business .

item.s: Stay current on the web .

If your website is rarely updated , be sure to stay connected to your followers through blogs and other ( free ) social media websites like Twitter , Facebook , YouTube , StumbleUpon , and Merchant Circle .

figure.rend: Use New and Traditional Media to Market Your Business Step 1.jpg

item.s: Use new media platforms wisely .
Do n't sign up for social media websites if you do n't know how to use them .
Research how to use each tool effectively , and only involve yourself with sites that fit your company 's business model accordingly .
If you do n't know why you are doing something , you probably should n't do it. . yet .
Find a way to properly make use of each social platform before making random posts .

figure.rend: Use New and Traditional Media to Market Your Business Step 2.jpg

item.s: Create a conversation around your brand .
Using new media platforms such as Twitter will create engagement .
You want your customers , clients , business partners , and affiliates to interact with your brand as much as possible .
Tweeting keeps your brand at the top of their mind .

figure.rend: Use New and Traditional Media to Market Your Business Step 3.jpg

item.s: Get your audience excited .
Raising brand awareness is more than putting fliers up and hoping for banner ad clicks , it 's creating an environment , a user experience , or a feeling that makes everyone want more .
It 's all about lasting impressions .

figure.rend: Use New and Traditional Media to Market Your Business Step 4.jpg

item.s: Do n't neglect traditional media .
Even the greatest campaigns combine both online tactics with traditional advertising .
You may have a great website , and an even cooler Facebook page , but how will your 9-5 workers who are stuck in rush hour until 6'oclock going to know where to find you ?
Think big and go bigger .
Truck side advertising , billboards , guerrilla tactics , and outdoor signage are all cost-effective tactics that make a big impact and spark interest .

figure.rend: Use New and Traditional Media to Market Your Business Step 5.jpg

item.s: Print big .
Right now , it 's all about visibility .
Why stay cooped up in a building with a tiny door logo that 's hard to find ?
You can fully wrap your office building , design eye-popping window graphics , and maximize your space with full color murals and floor graphics .
The key to brand awareness is connectivity .
Why have a great logo if is n't plastered all over your walls ?
Why host an open house without larger than life advertising ?
Think big and use large format printing to your best advantage .

figure.rend: Use New and Traditional Media to Market Your Business Step 6.jpg

item.s: Stay competitive and research trends .
Do n't just follow trends , try to do something different and unique in the spaces you compete in .
If your competitors have more tweets than you , think about an exclusive Twitter campaign to boost your own page .
The more time and creativity you invest in , the more results you 'll see in the end .
